data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: No matter what field you are in, whether it be marketing, sales, or advertising, it is important to have great marketing tactics. Companies ____ are ____ to ____ their ____ in a ____ and ____ way ____ not ____ successful. Good ____ tactics ____ the ____ way ____ catch ____ eye ____ consumers ____ lead ____ to ____ your ____. Some good examples of marketing tactics that have worked in the past are perfume companies giving out samples in airports, and mouthwash companies recommending their products by dental hygienists.
data.partBlankContent: No matter what field you are in, whether it be marketing, sales, or advertising, it is important to have great marketing tactics. Companies th__ are una___ to mar___ their prod____ in a crea____ and thoug_____ way wi__ not b_ successful. Good mark_____ tactics a__ the on__ way t_ catch t__ eye o_ consumers a__ lead th__ to b__ your pro____. Some good examples of marketing tactics that have worked in the past are perfume companies giving out samples in airports, and mouthwash companies recommending their products by dental hygienists.
data.answer: 无论你在哪个领域，无论是市场营销、销售还是广告，拥有优秀的营销策略都是很重要的。公司如果不能以一种创造性和周到的方式来营销他们的产品，就不会成功。好的营销策略是抓住消费者眼球并引导他们购买你的产品的唯一方法。过去行之有效的营销策略有:香水公司在机场分发样品，漱口水公司由牙科保健师推荐他们的产品。
